fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Draw people to a target’s house, redirecting the target’s two closest living neighbors to target them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You have Invincible Defense the first **Rampage** attack that hits you.
-Redirected players will know they were redirected.
-”Two closest neighbors” means the two living players with player numbers closest to your target. They do not have to be on opposite sides of your target.
